messages.content: TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Irma, now a category 4 hurricane, is heading towards the Leeward Islands in the Caribbean. It is expected to move near or over the northern part of the region by Tuesday night or Wednesday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Egypt signed a memo of understanding with China worth about $739 million for an electric train to a new capital. Egypt also signed during President Abdel Fattah al-Sisi s visit to China an agreement for funding worth $45 million for a satellite project.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

German Chancellor Angela Merkel says EU foreign ministers will discuss taking further sanctions against North Korea. North Korea s nuclear tests are a flagrant violation of all international conditions, Merkel says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The use of military force to resolve issues on the Korean peninsula is never an option, China's Foreign Ministry says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Indian and Chinese troops must maintain cooperation to ensure that a recent confrontation on their common border did not happen again. Jaishankar said peace in border areas was a prerequisite for India-China development.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
China s President Xi Jinping told India s Prime Minister Modi that the two countries should respect each other. Xi also told Modi that India should treat China s development correctly and rationally.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A Japan Airlines plane made an emergency landing at Tokyo s Haneda International Airport. Video footage appeared to show flames shooting from one engine of the Boeing 777 soon after takeoff. The plane, bound for New York, was carrying 233 passengers and 15 staff.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi and his Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping agreed that more needed to be done to avoid future border disputes. Modi and Xi on Tuesday met for more than an hour on the sidelines of the BRICS nations summit in the Chinese city of Xiamen.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Chinese President Xi Jinping says BRICS countries should deepen coordination on important global matters. Xi also said BRICS nations have made smooth progress on anti-terrorism and internet security cooperation.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The rocket started moving on Monday, a day after North Korea s sixth nuclear test. It was spotted moving at night to avoid surveillance, the report said. North Korea has launch facilities for its missile program on its west coast.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Two Russian servicemen killed in Deir al-Zor province. Islamic State militants shelled a convoy they were escorting. One soldier was killed on the spot and the other died in hospital.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump gave his in principle approval to lift restriction on South Korea s missile payload capabilities. Trump agreed to strengthen joint military capabilities during a call with South Korean President Moon Jae-in. North Korea said it tested an advanced hydrogen bomb for a long-range missile on Sunday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Abdusalom Azizov has replaced Qobul Berdiyev as defense minister. The reshuffle leaves Rustam Inoyatov, the only Karimov-era senior security official still in office. Pulat Bobojonov was named interior minister on Monday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Both agreed that the test of a hydrogen bomb means a new and unacceptable escalation by the North Korean regime. Merkel told Trump that Germany would push for tougher sanctions against North Korea by the European Union.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Russian President Vladimir Putin is currently discussing the North Korea crisis with his South Korean counterpart Moon Jae-in by phone. Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said it was easy for countries outside the region to talk of the possibility of a war with North Korea. He suggested other countries should be more cautious in their language.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The U.S. envoy to the U.N. said Monday the United States plans to circulate a new resolution on North Korea this week. Ambassador Nikki Haley urged the United Nations to impose the strongest possible measures to deter North Korea.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Kenya will hold a new presidential election on Oct. 17, an election official says. The Supreme Court nullified the vote held in August.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Britain s minister for the region says time is running out to restore devolved power-sharing. James Brokenshire says he wants to avoid a return of direct rule from London.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Russia's U.N. Ambassador Vassily Nebenzia said military solutions cannot settle the Korean Peninsula issues. He warned there was an  urgent need to maintain a cool head and refrain from any action that can escalate tensions.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

China's U.N. Ambassador Liu Jieyi urged North Korea to stop taking actions that are wrong. He called on all parties to seriously consider Beijing s proposal for a joint suspension of Pyongyang s ballistic missile and nuclear programs. North Korea conducted its sixth and most powerful nuclear test on Sunday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Ambassador to the U.N. Nikki Haley says enough is enough. She says incremental sanctions approach to North Korea since 2006 have not worked. She describes North Korean leader Kim Jong Un as  begging for war.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Pilot disappeared in a mysterious midair incident at a weekend airshow. Investigators are trying to determine how and why the unnamed pilot left the controls of his Agusta A-109. The Belgian Armed Forces said the pilot had fallen from the aircraft.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres counts on the Security Council to remain united and take appropriate action on North Korea, his political affairs chief says. Jeffrey Feltman warns the 15-member Security Council that as tensions rise, so does the risk of misunderstanding, miscalculation and escalation.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Brazilian authorities serving 127 arrest warrants in six states. Arrests part of a year-long investigation into international drug traffickers. Drug gangs shipped at least six tonnes of cocaine to European cities, police say.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Colombian President Juan Manuel Santos confirms ceasefire with ELN rebel group. Ceasefire will last 102 days, during which kidnappings, attacks on oil pipelines will cease.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
British police say a cordon in Victoria Square in Bolton has been lifted. Greater Manchester Police had earlier evacuated the square as a precautionary measure.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Syrian army and allied forces have come to within three km (two miles) of a government-held enclave besieged by Islamic State. With a lunge through jihadist lines, the army and its allies are close to relieving the Euphrates city.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Britain looking at all ways it can put pressure on North Korea after nuclear test. North Korea conducted its sixth nuclear test on Sunday. U.S. has warned of a massive military response if it or its allies were threatened.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Omer Celik says talk of ending Turkey s negotiations for EU accession amounted to an attack on Europe s founding principles. Comments came a day after German Chancellor Angela Merkel said it was clear that Turkey should not join the EU. Merkel s main challenger in Germany s Sept. 24 national election, Martin Schulz, has also promised to push for an end to Turkey s EU negotiations if elected chancellor.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Germany and France will ask the European Union to consult about the possibility of imposing heavier sanctions on North Korea. It is exclusively North Korea, its leadership, and President Kim who are responsible for this provocation, a spokesman said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

North Korea is clear about China s opposition to its nuclear tests, ministry spokesman says. China upholds talks as the means to resolve the Korean peninsula issue. North said it tested an advanced hydrogen bomb for a long-range missile on Sunday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

South Korea s defense ministry says it is still seeing signs that North Korea planned to stage more ballistic missile launches. The defense ministry was called by parliament on Monday to answer questions about North Korea s sixth and largest nuclear test.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

South Korean President Moon Jae-in and Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe spoke by phone. Both agreed to cooperate closely with each other and the United States. The aim of stronger sanctions was to draw North Korea into dialogue, a spokesman said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Abe spoke at the start of a meeting of ruling coalition lawmakers. North Korea conducted its sixth, and most powerful, nuclear test.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

South Korea said in June that it will hold off installing remaining components of the Terminal High Altitude Area Defense. The ministry will hold a briefing on the decision at 3:30 p.m. (0630 GMT) on Monday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump and Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe condemned North Korea's actions. Trump also reaffirmed that Washington would defend itself and its allies using the full range of diplomatic, conventional, and nuclear capabilities.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

German Chancellor Angela Merkel emerged as the clear winner of the only television debate. 49 percent viewed Merkel as being more credible while 29 percent favored Schulz. Merkel s overall performance was viewed as more convincing by 55 percent.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Merkel viewed as more credible by 33 percent compared to 17 percent for Schulz. Merkel came across as more competent, credible and likeable. Only category where Schulz scored higher was for being more combative.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres condemns North Korea s nuclear test. He calls on the country s leadership to cease such acts.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The European Union is prepared to ramp up sanctions against North Korea. North Korea conducted its sixth and most powerful nuclear test on Sunday. The EU stands ready to sharpen its policy of sanctions.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. intelligence official: U.S., have no reason to doubt North Korea test. North Korea claimed to have tested an advanced hydrogen bomb for a long-range missile. Official: It would take some time to complete a thorough analysis of the size of the blast.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The two leaders agreed to stick to the goal of denuclearisation on the Korean Peninsula. They were meeting on the sidelines of a summit of the BRICS group of nations.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Police fire tear gas to disperse supporters of Democratic Republic of Congo s opposition chief. Felix Tshisekedi, head of an opposition coalition, is due to fly back to the capital Kinshasa on Sunday. Around a dozen supporters had gathered at his family residences in the morning.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The Russian foreign ministry said on its website that the test was a defiance of international law. It urged all sides involved to hold talks, which it said was the only way to resolve the Korean peninsula s problems.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Tropical Storm Lidia doused various states in Mexico with heavy rain on Saturday. Victims were either electrocuted or drowned while trying to cross streams. Storm cut off power and damaged homes and roads in Baja California Sur.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump will nominate Kenneth Juster to be ambassador to India. Juster was a deputy assistant to Trump for international economic affairs. From 2001 to 2005 he was under secretary of Commerce under George W. Bush.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A convoy of Islamic State fighters and their families remains in the Syrian desert after turning back from the Iraqi border. The Syrian army and Lebanon s Hezbollah group gave safe passage to the jihadists. The U.S.-led coalition says it was not a party to the deal.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The explosions hit Af-Urur, 100 km (60 miles) south of the city of Bossaso. The attack coincided with Eid al-Adha, a Muslim holiday. Al Shabaab, linked to al Qaeda, claimed responsibility.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

British authorities have lifted a ban on carry-on electronic devices on planes arriving from Cairo airport. The United States and Britain in March imposed restrictions banning electronic devices from being carried on planes coming from certain airports in Muslim-majority countries.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

France's foreign minister says North Korea will have capability to send long-range ballistic missiles in a few months. Jean-Yves Le Drian urges China to be more active diplomatically to resolve the crisis.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov expressed regret during a phone call with his U.S. counterpart Rex Tillerson. Washington s move to close down Moscow s San Francisco consulate and two other annexes.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
North Korea's reckless action is a threat to Japan, Prime Minister Shinzo Abe says. Japan and Britain will cooperate to counter this, British Prime Minister Theresa May says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump spoke with Saudi King Salman on Wednesday. Saudi Arabia, along with Bahrain, the United Arab Emirates and Egypt, have cut political and trade ties with Qatar. They say Doha supports regional foe Iran and Islamists.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

France s young new president, Emmanuel Macron, said life as a world leader is less cool than it might seem. He cited talks with Turkish counterpart Tayyip Erdogan as an example. Erdogan is often criticized by leaders in Western Europe.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Around 60,000 inhabitants of Germany s financial capital Frankfurt will be ordered to leave their homes on Sunday. Germany s central bank, the Bundesbank, Frankfurt s Goethe University, and at least two hospitals will also be evacuated.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

South Korean President Moon Jae-in said North Korea s launch of an intermediate ballistic missile amounted to violent conduct to a neighbouring country. Moon agreed with Japanese Prime Minister Abe in a telephone call on Wednesday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

North Korean leader Kim Jong Un guided a launch of its Hwasong-12 intermediate-range ballistic missile on Tuesday. The launch was a drill to counter the joint military exercises by South Korean and U.S. militaries.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Iranian President Hassan Rouhani says U.S. demand for U.N. nuclear inspectors to visit Iran s military facilities unlikely to be accepted by the nuclear watchdog. The International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) is very unlikely to accept America s demand to inspect our military sites, Rouhani said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Britain has asked for the U.N. Security Council to meet on Wednesday. Violence between Rohingya insurgents and Myanmar security forces in Rakhine state. A series of coordinated attacks by Rohingya insurgents on security forces on Friday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Ambassador to the U.N. Nikki Haley said North Korea s launch of a missile over Japan was unacceptable. She said the Security Council now needed to take serious action. Haley said she hoped China and Russia would continue to work.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Kazakh President Nursultan Nazarbayev named Yerbolat Dosayev and Askar Zhumagaliyev deputy prime ministers on Tuesday. Dosayeva has previously run Baiterek, a state holding company in charge of banking and finance, while Zhumagsiyev has served as chief executive of state-owned nuclear company.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

South Korea condemns ballistic missile launch by North Korea. Missile flew over Japan and landed in the Pacific waters off Hokkaido. We will respond strongly based on our steadfast alliance with the United States.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Energy Secretary Rick Perry has canceled a planned visit to Kazakhstan. Perry was due to meet Kazakh Energy Minister Kanat Bozumbayev later on Monday. Harvey is the most powerful hurricane to hit Texas in more than 50 years.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Defense Ministry searching for three crew members of a Maritime Self-Defense Force helicopter. One crew member had been rescued uninjured. Helicopter lost contact around 90 km off the coast of Aomori Prefecture late on Saturday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin says new sanctions are aimed at hobbling the regime of President Nicolas Maduro. National security adviser H.R. McMaster says United States has no plans to take military action in Venezuela.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Foreign minister Boris Johnson says Britain will pay not a penny more. Financial settlement is set to be one of the most difficult issues to resolve. EU has said it is one of three areas the two sides must make progress on.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Britain and the EU return to the negotiating table on Monday with the leaving bill high on the agenda. A net 60 billion euros ($70.8 billion) has been floated in Brussels. Were it to be correct, Britain would now owe around  9.4 billion pounds ($12 billion) more than it would have at the time of the vote.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.N. condemns coordinated series of attacks on Myanmar security forces. At least 21 insurgents and 11 members of the security forces killed. Militants staged a major coordinated attack on 24 police posts and an army base.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Immigration police chief says he believes former PM Yingluck Shinawatra remains in Thailand. A Supreme Court judge raised suspicion that she had fled after she failed to show up on Friday for a verdict in a negligence case. Yingluck, whose government was ousted in a 2014 coup, faces up to 10 years in prison.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Poland will not change its stance on the European Union s posted workers directive, PM says. Prime Minister Beata Szydlo: "We will defend our position to the very end"
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Finnish police release one of six men detained over last week's stabbing spree. Main suspect, who is in custody, has been named as Abderrahman Mechkah, an 18-year-old Moroccan. Stabbings in the city of Turku have been treated as the first suspected Islamist militant attack.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A 14-year-old boy was detained by Saudi police for dancing to the song Macarena. The boy was filmed dancing in front of five lanes of cars stopped at a traffic light. Police had said he had shown improper public behavior and disrupted traffic.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
LexisNexis said it had withdrawn two products from the Chinese market in March. The company was asked to remove some content from its database, it said.
True
